modify_description: Changed run_code parameter in step37 to search for cloudbed-2 telemetry data instead of cloudbed-1
Tool response returns data showing paymentservice-0 had high CPU load and low success rate during the failure window

Final answer changed from: {"1": {"root cause occurrence datetime": "2022-03-20 15:00:00", "root cause component": "frontend-0", "root cause reason": "container process termination"}} to: {"1": {"root cause occurrence datetime": "2022-03-20 15:05:00", "root cause component": "paymentservice-0", "root cause reason": "container CPU load"}}
original_correct_answer: {"1": {"root cause occurrence datetime": "2022-03-20 15:00:00", "root cause component": "frontend-0", "root cause reason": "container process termination"}}
wrong_final_answer: {"1": {"root cause occurrence datetime": "2022-03-20 15:05:00", "root cause component": "paymentservice-0", "root cause reason": "container CPU load"}}
causality_chain: step37: run_code uses cloudbed-2 path parameter instead of cloudbed-1 (invalid param error) -> tool returns cloudbed-2's telemetry data -> agent analyzes incorrect data -> infers wrong root cause for cloudbed-1 failure
